mapper.select: update stumanager.student set sname = #{sname},ssex = #{ssex},sage = #{sage},sdept = #{sdept} where student.sno = #{sno};
mapper.insert: insert into stumanager.student (sno, sname, ssex, sage, sdept) values (#{sno},#{sname},#{ssex},#{sage},#{sdept});
mapper.select: select course.cno,course.cname,scc.grade from (select sc.cno,sc.grade from sc where sc.sno = #{sno}) scc,course where scc.cno = course.cno;
mapper.update: update sc set grade = #{grade} where sno = #{sno} and cno = #{cno};
